T02D1857:42b-1: shr'i he ru ka s'a dha nam /
T02D1857:42b-3: dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1857:42b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1857:42b-5: dpal ldan he ru 'gro ba'i mgon //
T02D1857:42b-6: bsgyur nas don kun phun sum tshogs //
T02D1857:42b-7: 'gro la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1857:42b-8: dang po 'di ltar bsgom par bya //
T02D1857:42b-9: zur gsum mtshos kyi dbyings gnas pa //
T02D1857:42b-10: gzhal yas khang gi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1857:42b-11: sna tshogs padma zla ba la //
T02D1857:42b-12: rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba'i 'od //
T02D1857:42b-13: dbus zhal sku ni shel 'dra ba //
T02D1857:42b-14: g-yas g-yon gnag dang dmar ba'o //
T02D1857:42b-16: rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad //
T02D1857:43a-2: rang sams [*bsams?] yi ge gsum du bya //
T02D1857:43a-3: rdo rje de las padmar babs //
T02D1857:43a-4: 'dod chags me yis thams cad zhu //
T02D1857:43a-5: spyan la sogs pas rang dbyangs kyis //
T02D1857:43a-6: bzhengs pa'i don du bskul bar bya //
T02D1857:43a-8: hr'i: las skyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1857:43a-9: de bskyed snying rje'i khro bo ni //
T02D1857:43a-10: 'jigs byed chen po thod phreng thogs //
T02D1857:43a-11: khro gnyer skra smin gyen du 'ang 'bar //
T02D1857:43a-12: nag po mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02D1857:43a-13: g-yas ni dkar po g-yon dmar te //
T02D1857:43a-14: dur khrod thal bas bskus pa'i sku //
T02D1857:43a-15: drag po la sogs drug dang ldan //
T02D1857:43a-16: rang gi rig ma nyid kyis 'khyud //
T02D1857:43a-17: rdo rje nag po ral gri dang //
T02D1857:43a-18: kha tv'am rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
T02D1857:43a-19: keng rus gsum phreng dbul bcings //
T02D1857:43a-20: yang dag rgyan dang na bzar ldan //
T02D1857:43a-21: g-yas kyi 'og na bzhin gnon pa //
T02D1857:43a-22: g-yon gyi brla yis nu mar gzir //
T02D1857:43a-23: khro bo'i skyil krung legs gnas pa //
T02D1857:43a-24: bdag nyid he ru kar bsgoms te //
T02D1857:43a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang drug bsgom //
T02D1857:43a-26: sku gsung thugs kyang yi ge gsum //
T02D1857:43a-27: thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' dang //
T02D1857:43a-28: mi bskyod dbu rgyan 'bras bu mchog / dam pa'i dga' ba bde ba myangs //
T02D1857:43a-30: ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1857:43a-32: dpa' bo lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1857:43a-34: skra bshig thal bas lus bskus nas //
T02D1857:43a-35: rtag tu bsgoms nas bza' bar bya //
T02D1857:43a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang //
T02D1857:43a-37: 'gro ba kun gyi don byed dang //
T02D1857:43a-38: shes rab snying rje bsgom pa dang //
T02D1857:43a-39: rdo rje dbyangs blang thod rgyan dang //
T02D1857:43a-40: cang te'u kha tv'am gzung ba dang //
T02D1857:43a-41: bsgoms nas snying po bzlas pa dang //
T02D1857:43a-42: gsang nas rnal 'byor dus rtag tu //
T02D1857:43a-43: de ltar brtul zhugs he ru ka / he ru ka yi gnas dgu la //
T02D1857:43a-44: mtshan mo bsgrub par bsnyen par bya //
